rounds.comments: (Alex: We'll give you the name of the individual who's talking; you have to identify the work of literature that that's from.)

When a joke causes people to "cachinnate", they're doing this too loudly

This banded mammal can be seen in the Southern U.S. & in The Clash's "Rock The Casbah" video

clues.text: God told Joshua, "Make thee sharp knives" & do this to the male Israelites "A second time"
